name: Forward Thinker
description:
NOTE: PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE IF YOU'RE GOING TO PLAY IN BROWSER, IF YOU'RE IN ITCH.IO APP PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS VERSION

FORWARD THINKER

Take control of a small pixelated guy to make it to the end of the level... or don't. Because he doesn't like your control over him. You need to tell him exactly what to do before he even starts, by dragging actions into a timeline. After that, he's OUT OF  (your) CONTROL.

CONTROLS:

Left Click to drag&drop actions.

(Shortcut, button at the down-right does the same) Right Click to play/rewind timeline.

Q to Go to the previous stage and E to skip the current stage. (Please don't skip unless you want to get to a specific level, if you're stuck, all answers for the stages are down below)

CHEAT SHEET (Solutions to all the levels, don't look unless you're stuck, # means empty, there are multiple solutions to some of the levels, but all of these work)

Level 1:
> > > > > # # #

Level 2:
- - - > ^ - - >

Stage 3:
> ^ - - > ^ - >

Stage 4:
> ^ > ^ # - - >

Stage 5:
> ^ > < # - - >

Stage 6:
- - - > < > ^ >

Stage 7:
> ^ > < > ^ - >

Stage 8:
> ^ > < > ^ - >

Stage 9:

???
